pr_title: Don't download the full AWS SDK every time

timeline.bodyText: Looks fine to me. Just one question - do the Maven mojos have their Set type members initialized to a non-null instance if no configurations have been specified for that parameter? If not, I think we should include a null check here for ignoredGroupIds just to prevent a NPE in future when/if we stop configuring any ignored groups.
timeline.author: jaikiran

replies.bodyText: Good catch, turns out it doesn't
replies.author: stuartwdouglas

timeline.message:
Don't donwload the full AWS SDK every time

Because we import the bom the processor wants to download every
AWS SDK artifact. This takes forever and because they release so
often is a real drain on productivity.
